name: Cybersecurity_JUN.2023
description: The Cybersecurity Collection represents the skills necessary for professionals responsible for securing computer systems and networks against unauthorized access. It includes knowledge based on the NICE Framework. This collection of skills was developed in partnership with a panel of subject matter experts who have worked in cybersecurity.
